attributes.action: Government re-assign money for South UK and Wales flood victims.
attributes.additional_details: The Government must undertake to re-assign monies to aid the flood victims in South and South West England and in Wales, this money should come from the coffers for Parliamentary expenses for Ministers, the initial monies that have been taken away from flood defences and from foriegn aid in countries where the UK has no legal obligation. These monies should be paid directly to help the victims to put their homes back in order and to provide new homes and business premises for those who have lost them due to the floods.
